name: ghlocalapi
description: Documentation for Google Home's local API
author: Rithvik Vibhu <rithvikvibhu@gmail.com> (https://keybase.io/rithvikvibhu)

scripts.build: redoc-cli bundle --ssr --title 'Google Home Local API' --output dist/index.html GoogleHome.openapi3.json
scripts.serve: redoc-cli serve --ssr --title 'Google Home Local API' GoogleHome.openapi3.json
